snippet: New Orleans, which travels to play Philadelphia on Saturday, has never won a postseason road game, even in the previous seven years as one of the N.F.L.’s strongest teams.
abstract: New Orleans Saints, preparing for playoff showdown in Philadelphia against the Eagles, have never won a postseason road game, even in the previous seven years as one of the NFL's strongest teams.
lead_paragraph: New Orleans, which travels to play Philadelphia on Saturday, has never won a postseason road game, even in the previous seven years as one of the N.F.L.’s strongest teams.

headline.main: Dominant in Dome, Saints Face Tough Road as They Try to Defy Trends
headline.print_headline: Dominant in Dome, Saints Face Tough Road As They Try to Defy Trends
